description:
Course Finished

If you're a PHP beginner and ask what is the next step and how to start your first project .

if you're a developer has projects already, but you have tired of writing primitive not clean codes and repeated it many times with each project.


Or you’re working on one of the hard frameworks and think that the programming is boring and hard.

If you have motivation for self-development and want to see real programming world.

Hi and Welcome to the LARAVEL world.


My name is Fakhr.. PHP developer, Web instructor. And I am so excited to take you on this journey


On this journey you will figure out how LARAVEL framework makes developing with PHP language really fun, and so easy to writing professional clean code.

LARAVEL provides you with a reliable, Tidy and Neat code, as example you can build pagination just by one line .it’s amazing


this Which makes the learning curve easier for beginners .LARAVEL will save you a lot, it has many tools for most of the repetitive tasks that every developer needs, which enables you to accomplish medium projects and even large with less time and without need to re-invent the wheel. There are...Authentication..... Template system...Routing...Caching... and Artisan magic tool that generate many things, do many tasks with just one command line
also contains composer.. A wonderful tool that lets you add any package that your project need

Only search install and it’s done... Goodbye CMS


LARAVEL has an active community is growing and very helpful..You can ask for support when you are in trouble
We will discuss some of these in a practical step-by-step approach and by the end of the journey we will have been able to build Simple app from scratch By LARAVEL
Are you ready?..See you in the journey

Course Teaching Method:

  1. introduction chapter
  2. After that each chapter contains a lecture to explain the concept and then apply it and so on to the end of the course
  3. To explain difficult concepts we use photos and illustrative drawings

why this course ?

  • Because this course will be updated and consistently improved
  • Because the learning curve is simple and focuses on clarifying difficult concepts through practical implementation
title: Laravel 4 try and enjoy php coding
